law.catch_line: Selection committee procedures to apply when procuring services of construction manager-agency for a fee.
law.text: The selection committee procedures established in KRS 45A.180 shall apply when procuring services of a construction manager-agency for a fee if the fee amount exceeds fifty thousand dollars ($50,000).
law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 12, effective June 24, 2003.
